name: Victorian Rose Cut Diamond Ring
description: An exquisite Victorian-era ring featuring a rose cut diamond set in 18ct yellow gold. The hand-carved gallery work demonstrates the finest craftsmanship of the period. This piece has been carefully restored while maintaining its original character and patina.

name: Edwardian Sapphire & Diamond Ring
description: A stunning Edwardian ring showcasing a natural Ceylon sapphire surrounded by old mine cut diamonds. Set in platinum with intricate milgrain detailing. The craftsmanship reflects the elegance and refinement of the Edwardian era.
stones: Natural Sapphire (1.2ct), Old Mine Cut Diamonds (0.60ct total)

name: Art Deco Emerald & Diamond Ring
description: A magnificent Art Deco ring featuring a Colombian emerald flanked by baguette diamonds. The geometric design is quintessentially Art Deco, with clean lines and architectural symmetry. Crafted in platinum with exceptional attention to detail.

name: Georgian Mourning Ring
description: A rare Georgian mourning ring with black enamel detailing and a central memorial compartment. The band features 'In Memory Of' inscription in elegant script. A poignant piece of history, beautifully preserved.

name: Victorian Ruby Cluster Ring
description: A charming Victorian cluster ring centered with a Burmese ruby surrounded by old cut diamonds. The flower-head design was highly popular during the Victorian period. Set in 18ct gold with a delicate carved gallery.
stones: Burmese Ruby (0.65ct), Old Cut Diamonds (0.50ct total)

name: Art Nouveau Opal Ring
description: An enchanting Art Nouveau ring featuring a large Australian opal with remarkable play of color. The flowing, organic setting is characteristic of the Art Nouveau movement. Crafted in 9ct gold with naturalistic detailing.

name: Retro Aquamarine Cocktail Ring
description: A bold Retro-era cocktail ring showcasing a large aquamarine in a sculptural gold setting. The substantial design reflects the glamorous aesthetic of the 1940s. Perfect as a statement piece.

name: Edwardian Pearl & Diamond Ring
description: A delicate Edwardian ring featuring a natural pearl flanked by old European cut diamonds. The platinum setting showcases the period's finest filigree work. Elegant and timeless.
stones: Natural Pearl (6mm), Old European Cut Diamonds (0.30ct total)
